blocks.content_html:
Navigation

Unreal Engine C++ API Reference > Plugins > ChaosCloth > ChaosCloth

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • UClothConfigBase
  • UClothConfigCommon
  • UChaosClothConfig

References

   
Module ChaosCloth
Header /Engine/Plugins/ChaosCloth/Source/ChaosCloth/Public/ChaosCloth/ChaosClothConfig.h
Include #include "ChaosCloth/ChaosClothConfig.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (HideCategories=(Collision), MinimalAPI)  
class UChaosClothConfig : public UClothConfigCommon

Remarks

Holds initial, asset level config for clothing actors.

Variables

  Type Name Description
float AngularVelocityScale The amount of angular velocities sent to the local cloth space from the reference bone (the closest bone to the root on which the cloth section has been skinned, or the root itself if the cloth isn't skinned).
FChaosClothWeightedValue AnimDriveDamping The damping amount of the anim drive.
FChaosClothWeightedValue AnimDriveStiffness The strength of the constraint driving the cloth towards the animated goal mesh.
FChaosClothWeightedValue AreaStiffnessWeighted The stiffness of the surface area preservation constraints.
bool bEnableOuterDrag  
bool bEnableOuterLift  
FChaosClothWeightedValue BendingStiffnessWeighted The Stiffness of cross segments and bending elements constraints.
float BucklingRatio Once the element has bent such that it's folded more than this ratio from its rest angle ("buckled"), switch to using Buckling Stiffness instead of Bending Stiffness.
FChaosClothWeightedValue BucklingStiffnessWeighted Bending will use this stiffness instead of Bending Stiffness once the cloth has buckled, i.e., bent beyond a certain angle.
bool bUseBendingElements Enable the more accurate bending element constraints instead of the faster cross-edge spring constraints used for controlling bending stiffness.
bool bUseCCD Use continuous collision detection (CCD) to prevent any missed collisions between fast moving particles and colliders.
bool bUseContinuousCollisionDetection Enable continuous collision detection.
bool bUseGeodesicDistance Use geodesic instead of euclidean distance calculations for the Long Range Attachment constraint, which is slower at setup but more accurate at establishing the correct position and length of the tethers, and therefore is less prone to artifacts during the simulation.
bool bUseGravityOverride Use the config gravity value instead of world gravity.
bool bUseLegacyBackstop This parameter is automatically set by the migration code.
bool bUsePointBasedWindModel This parameter is automatically set by the migration code.
bool bUseSelfCollisions Enable self collision repulsion forces (point-face).
bool bUseSelfCollisionSpheres Enable sphere-based self collision repulsion forces.
bool bUseSelfIntersections Enable self intersection resolution.
bool bUseTetrahedralConstraints Enable tetrahedral constraints.
bool bUseThinShellVolumeConstraints Enable thin shell volume constraints.
float CollisionThickness The added thickness of collision shapes.
float DampingCoefficient The amount of global damping applied to the cloth velocities, also known as point damping.
float Density The value used when Mass Mode is set to Density.
FChaosClothWeightedValue Drag The aerodynamic coefficient of drag applying on each particle.
FChaosClothWeightedValue EdgeStiffnessWeighted The Stiffness of segments constraints.
float FictitiousAngularScale The portion of the angular velocity that is used to calculate the strength of all fictitious forces (e.g. centrifugal force).
FChaosClothWeightedValue FlatnessRatio Calculate rest angles as a ratio between completely flat and whatever is the 3D rest angle.
float FrictionCoefficient Friction coefficient for cloth - collider interaction.
FVector Gravity The gravitational acceleration vector [cm/s^2].
float GravityScale Scale factor applied to the world gravity and also to the clothing simulation interactor gravity. Does not affect the gravity if set using the override below.
FChaosClothWeightedValue Lift The aerodynamic coefficient of lift applying on each particle.
FVector LinearVelocityScale The amount of linear velocities sent to the local cloth space from the reference bone (the closest bone to the root on which the cloth section has been skinned, or the root itself if the cloth isn't skinned).
float LocalDampingCoefficient The amount of local damping applied to the cloth velocities.
EClothMassMode MassMode How cloth particle mass is determined
float MinPerParticleMass This is a lower bound to cloth particle masses.
FChaosClothWeightedValue OuterDrag The aerodynamic coefficient of drag applying on each particle when the air velocity is moving against the mesh normal direction.
FChaosClothWeightedValue OuterLift The aerodynamic coefficient of lift applying on each particle when the air velocity is moving against the mesh normal direction.
FChaosClothWeightedValue Pressure Pressure force strength applied in the normal direction(use negative value to push toward backface) If an enabled Weight Map (Mask with values in the range [0;1]) targeting the "Pressure" is added to the cloth, then both the Low and High values will be used in conjunction with the per particle Weight stored in the Weight Map to interpolate the final value from them.
float SelfCollisionFriction Friction coefficient for cloth - cloth interaction.
float SelfCollisionSphereRadius The radius of the spheres used in self collision centered at each vertex.
float SelfCollisionSphereRadiusCullMultiplier Multiplier for culling the self collision spheres.
float SelfCollisionSphereStiffness The stiffness of the springs used to control self collision.
float SelfCollisionThickness The radius of the spheres used in self collision.
float ShapeTargetStiffness The stiffness of the shape target constraints.
FChaosClothWeightedValue TetherScale The limit scale of the long range attachment constraints (aka tether limit).
FChaosClothWeightedValue TetherStiffness The tethers' stiffness of the long range attachment constraints.
float TotalMass The value used when Mass Mode is set to TotalMass.
float UniformMass The value used when the Mass Mode is set to Uniform Mass.
float VolumeStiffness The stiffness of the volume preservation constraints.

Constructors

  Type Name Description
 

UChaosClothConfig ()

  

Destructors

  Type Name Description
 

~UChaosClothConfig ()

  

Functions

  Type Name Description
float

GetMassValue ()

 Return the mass value, from whichever mass mode (Density, UniformMass, or TotalMass) is selected.
void

MigrateFrom ( const UClothSharedConfigCommon* ClothSharedConfig
)

 Migrate from shared config.
void

PostLoad ()

 PostLoad override used to deal with updates/changes in properties.
void

Serialize ( FArchive& Ar
)

 Serialize override used to set the current custom version.

Overridden from UClothConfigCommon

  Type Name Description
float

GetSelfCollisionRadius ()

 Return the self collision radius to precomute self collision data.
void

MigrateFrom ( const FClothConfig_Legacy&
)

 Migrate from the legacy FClothConfig structure.
bool

NeedsInverseMasses ()

 Return wherether to pre-compute Inverse Masses.
bool

NeedsSelfCollisionData ()

 Return whether to pre-compute self collision data.
bool

NeedsTethers ()

 Return wherether to pre-compute the Long Range Attachment tethers.
bool

TethersUseGeodesicDistance ()

 Return whether tethers need to be calculated using geodesic distances instead of eclidean.

Deprecated Variables

  Type Name Description
float AnimDriveSpringStiffness_DEPRECATED  
float AreaStiffness_DEPRECATED The stiffness of the area preservation constraints.
float BendingStiffness_DEPRECATED The Stiffness of the bending constraints.
float DragCoefficient_DEPRECATED  
float EdgeStiffness_DEPRECATED Deprecated properties.
float LiftCoefficient_DEPRECATED  
float LimitScale_DEPRECATED  
float StrainLimitingStiffness_DEPRECATED  
EChaosClothTetherMode TetherMode_DEPRECATED

description: Hiding categories that will be used in the future.
title: UChaosClothConfig
